characters.name: Iron Man
characters.description: Tony Stark, a genius inventor, dons his high-tech armor to become the superhero Iron Man.

characters.name: Captain America
characters.description: Steve Rogers, a super-soldier with enhanced strength and agility, fights for justice as Captain America.

characters.name: Darth Vader
characters.description: Anakin Skywalker, once a Jedi Knight, falls to the dark side and becomes the iconic Sith Lord, Darth Vader.

characters.name: Yoda
characters.description: Yoda, a wise and powerful Jedi Master, trains young Jedi and wields his lightsaber with unmatched skill.

characters.name: Optimus Prime
characters.description: Optimus Prime, the noble leader of the Autobots, transforms into a powerful truck and defends Earth against the Decepticons.

characters.name: Bumblebee
characters.description: Bumblebee, a brave Autobot scout, takes the form of a yellow sports car and befriends humans in the battle against evil.
